title: Vehicle operator licensing: partner self-service system

details.description: This tool allows enforcement agencies (eg the police) and other partner organisations to search the vehicle operator licence database
details.more_information:
You need a partner organisation ID and password to access the system.

If you don’t have these, you can request them by email or by calling the VOSA helpline.

VOSA helpline
self.service@vosa.gov.uk
0300 123 9000
details.introduction: You can use this tool if you’re from an enforcement agency (eg the police) or other Vehicle and Operator Services Agency (VOSA) partner organisation. It lets you search the vehicle operator licence database.

details.description: Includes setting up test stations, employing drivers and becoming a vehicle operator

Book your driving test or get a tax disc online, find out the legal requirements for buying, owning, importing or scrapping a car or motorcycle, and read about your rights and responsibilities as a driver.
